name: shared-chest-inventory
title: Remote support-chest
author: ZwerOxotnik
description:
Get rid of annoying manipulation with crafting. Press K on any chest/wagon/etc to attach its inventory to you.
As you click on an item in the crafting panel the support chest will try to find the item in itself and transfer to you right away (without drones etc).
(NOT FULLY TESTED, doesn't support all actions fully yet)
